It has powerful transfer and payment functions. It aims to provide more convenient and simple services for ordinary users, and is committed to making block chain technology more close to life.

balance Safety warning The private key is unencrypted and the export is risky. It is recommended to use QR codes and keystore for backup. Suggestions on Preservation Please do not take a direct screenshot. It is recommended that the offline device transmit this file by scanning QR codes, copy and paste the Keystore file or the screenshot QR code to a safe and offline place for saving. It is recommended that the offline device transmits this file by scanning the QR code, or take a screenshot of the QR code and save it in a safe and offline place.
QR code Do not use network transmission Please do not transfer private key files through network tools, and do not save them to email, notepad, network disk, chat tools, etc. Once acquired by hackers, irreparable asset losses will be caused. //
Password safe preservation.
